name: Safeguard
description: Start with Mobile Shield and M500 Shotgun. Take 100% less friendly fire damage while using Shield Charge or Blocking

name: Peripheral Vision
description: Increase angle at which attacks will be blocked by your Shield by 10% (base: 220 deg)

name: Secret Stash II
description: Carried ammo capacity for primary weapons is increased by 5%

name: Quick Hands
description: Blocking zombie hit or performing Shield Charge reloads your primary and secondary weapons

name: Adrenaline Rush
description: Blocking zombie hit or performing Shield Charge fully restores melee stamina

name: Fancy Footwork
description: Better maneuverability when using Shield Charge and you can move 30% faster while blocking

name: Breakthrough!
description: Hitting an enemy while using the Shield Charge will grant you 75% temporary health

name: Passive Aggression
description: Shield Block can withstand incoming hits for 3 more seconds (base: 5 seconds)

name: All-Round Defense
description: For the first 3 seconds Shield Block protects you from all directions

name: Residual Defense
description: Take 50% less damage from zombies for 3 seconds after Shield Block ends

name: Hoplite
description: All teammates take 25% less damage if you hold the Shield Block within 5 meters of them

name: Conditioning
description: You can perform 2 more Shield Charges per full shield energy (base: 2 charges)

name: Recuperation
description: You won't be able to collect equipment bags, but your Shield energy will constantly recharge (140 seconds to replenish to maximum)

name: Pickpocket
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 30 seconds)

name: Tax collector
description: You refill 1 equipment charge for each special zombie hit during a shield charge (cooldown: 30 seconds)

name: Armor Plated
description: You gain passive shield protection for 3 seconds when you start interacting with something (cooldown 10 sec)

name: Steadfast
description: All zombie damage is reduced by 25% when using Shield Block

name: Don't bother him!
description: Take 15% less damage while using a Mortar or a Stationary Machine Gun

name: Stronger Together
description: Health for you and all teammates increased by 7.5%

name: Outer Shell
description: When your health is below 30% incoming damage depletes Shield energy before health. Full Shield energy prevents damage up to 50% of health

name: Juggernaut
description: Health increased by 35% but sprint stamina decreased by 50%

name: Guard dog
description: Start with an improved Forest Warrior Chainsaw that deals 50% more damage and has 50% more fuel. All Forest Warrior Chainsaw pickups for you are also improved

name: Rolling Refill
description: Passing near an Ammo Crate during a Shield Charge automatically refills your ammo

name: Magnet
description: Restore 2% of primary weapon ammo for each enemy killed with a Shield Charge

name: Supply Train
description: Passing near a teammate during a Shield Charge reloads their primary weapon. You receive 5% ammo for your primary weapon for each teammate reloaded

name: Special coating
description: Passing near a teammate during a Shield Charge grants a 75% temporary health boost to them

name: Freight Train
description: You can kill 40% more zombies with a shield charge (base: 14 zombies)

name: Shake It Off
description: Performing a Shield Charge removes all negative effects received from special zombies

name: Long Run
description: Your Shield Charge speed and covered distance increased by 20%

name: Bad odor II
description: There is a chance that killing a special zombie will cause it to drop a primary weapon (cooldown: 180 seconds)

name: On Your Feet
description: A single incapacitated teammate within 2 meters of where you finish a Shield Charge will get back up on their feet

name: Secret Stash
description: Carried ammo capacity for secondary weapons increased by 15%

name: Strong Genes
description: After getting infected, you can withstand for 2 more seconds before turning

name: Elbow Room
description: When you, or a teammate within 2 meters of you, starts reviving an incapacitated character, surrounding enemies will be pushed back (cooldown 60 seconds)

name: Placebo Effect
description: Heal 10% of max health when someone uses a medkit within 2 meters of you and you're not the target of healing

name: Inspirational
description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession while you are the only member of your team still standing respawns a randomly selected dead teammate (cooldown 60 seconds)

name: Risen from the ashes
description: When you become the last member of your team standing, you gain temporary health (cooldown: 60 seconds)

name: Sturdy
description: When your Shield Block is completely expended, you gain a temporary health boost (cooldown 60 sec)

name: Hurry Back
description: Respawn time for the whole team decreased by 15%

name: Centre of Attention
description: Activating Shield Block will force all zombies within 3 meters in front of you to target you instead of your teammates

name: Reinforced metal
description: The Shield Block reduces all damage by 5%

name: Trail Blazer
description: Finishing a Shield Charge sets enemies in front of you on fire (distance 2 meters)

name: You Made me Mad
description: Melee attacks and firearms deal 50% more damage for 5 seconds after you holster the Shield

name: Avenger
description: Firearm damage increased by 20% for each dead or incapacitated teammate

name: Revenge
description: You take 5% less damage for each killed or incapacitated teammate

name: Breathing Room
description: Automatically push back nearby zombies when you are hit and about to be incapacitated (cooldown 60 seconds)

name: Linebacker
description: Shield Charge allows you to run for an additional 1 seconds (base: 5 seconds)

name: Harvester
description: Killing 15 zombies during a Shield Charge restores 5% rounds to the primary weapon's magazine
